message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. Given its worth, I'm initially offering it at $1,500,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering its worth to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective on the price, the product's value is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000.  This is a fair offer considering its potential.

I understand that you're willing to come down from $1,500,000 to $1,300,000, but I'm still not convinced that's the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,200,000 for the product.
